general_requirements.statewide_program_name: Standardized statewide solar permit application process. All municipalities must use consistent procedures. Residential Solar Energy Disclosure and Homeowners Bill of Rights Act effective March 2025.

interconnection.net_metering_details: Net metering with Rhode Island Energy (formerly National Grid). Renewable Energy Growth Program provides additional incentives.
interconnection.fees: Rhode Island Energy: minimal interconnection fee

special_considerations.hoa_restrictions: RI Gen. Laws 34-40 protects solar access.
special_considerations.historic_districts: Historic review may be required in designated areas.
special_considerations.wind_load_requirements: Coastal areas enhanced requirements. Design wind speeds 110-130 mph.

licensing.license_type: Rhode Island Contractors Registration Board license required.

notes: Standardized statewide permitting effective 2025. Applications require single-line electrical diagram with panel configuration, voltage specs, kW output, main panel capacity, and overcurrent protection.
